entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over southern sections late this morning and this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing rain. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of freezing rain before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over southern sections this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
